Connection: - Frequency_Band: Theta (4-6 Hz) or Alpha (6-9 Hz)
- N: Number of infants with valid data
- N_connections: Number of GPDC values averaged per infant
- SD_GPDC: Standard deviation of GPDC strength
- VIP_score: Variable Importance in Projection score from PLS regression
- SE_beta: Standard error of beta weight
- CI_lower/upper: 95% confidence interval for beta weight
- Significant_Predictor: VIP > 1.0 indicates important predictor of learning
- N1/N2: Sample sizes for each condition
- M_diff: Mean difference in GPDC strength between conditions
- SE_diff: Standard error of the difference
- t: t-statistic from independent samples t-test
- Hedges_g: Effect size with small sample correction
- CI_lower/upper: 95% bootstrap confidence interval for effect size
- Predictors: GPDC strengths for all connections × frequency bands
- VIP threshold: VIP > 1.0 indicates important predictor
- Hedges' g with small sample correction
- MVAR model order: Selected via AIC/BIC
- Averaged across trials and time windows
- Connections with failed MVAR convergence excluded
6. Round to 3 decimal places for GPDC values
